title: Mangalavaaram
story: In a village plagued by deaths, SI Maya grapples with superstition and the spirit of a mysterious girl. Can she unravel the puzzel and save the community?

title: Siren
story: A cat-and-mouse chase unfolds as a tainted police officer zeroes in on Thilaga varman, a parolee suspected in a spate of murders. But is he truly the culprit?

title: Manjummel Boys
story: Manjummel boy's carefree adventure takes a dangerous turn when one of them plunges into Guna Caves, igniting a test of unity in a gripping fight for survival

title: Malikappuram
story: Little Kallu longs for a glimpse of Swami Ayyapan. When she sets out on the pilgrimage to Sabarimala, a mysterious person steps forward to help. Who is he?

title: PARKING
story: A clash over a shared space transforms two men from diverse backgrounds into aggressors. Will ego triumph, or can shared intentions lead to resolution?

title: JOE
story: Joe, who is reeling from a heartbreak by his college sweetheart, reluctantly enters an arranged marriage. What surprises await in this new chapter for him?

title: SABA NAYAGAN
story: Arrested for nuisance, Saba spins wild breakup tales to melt a sympathetic cop, hoping to charm his way out. Whose story is he narrating, and will his plan work?

title: HRIDAYAM
story: From carefree college days to becoming a successful wedding photographer, this coming-of-age story depicts the colours of Arun Neelakandan's exciting life.

title: PREMALU
story: Charm and chaos collide in Sachin's whimsicalquest for Reenu's heart. Amidst mishaps and mischef, can he find the key to unlock true love's door?

title: BANGALORE DAYS
story: Three cousins - Divya,Kuttan and Arjun - have always dreamt of living in Bagalore. When they get there, they end up discovering their true selves.
In the ominous village of Kotha,'King' Raju makes a comeback with a cop's aid. Challenging Kannan's rule, he ignites a showdown of power and retribution
title: KING OF KOTHA
Baahubali 2
story: Why did Kattappa Kill Amarendra Baahubali? Find out the answer to this monumental question as you watch Amarendra's son in action in the sequel.

title: Thuppakki
story: An army captain visits Mumbai to find a bride. His plans change after an explosion that sets him off on a mission to disable a terrorist cell in the city.

title: Madras
story: Kaali and his politically charged friend Anbu get into a heated debate over walls on which to put up party posters. How far will they go to prove their point?

title: Maari
story: Maari, a local don, is notorious for troubling people and extorting money. Tables turn when he falls for sridevi, who gives him taste of his own medicine.

title: Siruthai
story: A small-time thief's life changes when a little girl claims to be his daughter. He then decides to punish the criminals who are responsible for her plight.

title: Sultan
story: Despite being raised by hardened criminals, Vikram, aka Sulthan, hates violence and decides to transform them into law-abiding citizens. But will they agree?

title: Bharath Ennum Naan
story: When circumstances land a young Bharat in the position of the Chief Minister, he has to deal with corruption and enemies while attempting to reform politics.

title: Anbarivu
story: Stoic and Kind-hearted Arivu decides to switch places with his street-smart rowdy twin, Anbu, to unite their estranged families. And a frenzy begins.

title: Maari 2
story: Maari, a local don, in his new naughty-turned-nice avtar, manages to get into the bad books of Beeja, a murakami fan, who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

title: MCA
story: Young, middle-class boy Nanihas to protect his Sister-in-law, atransport official from a gangster, who runs an illegal transport business.

title: UNGALUKKAGA ORUVAN
story: When a Software company CEO, Rishi, returns to India and reunites with his former classmate, little does he know that things are way worse than they look.

title: TAANAKKARAN
story: Spurred by his dark past, Arivu wants to become a police officer. However, his training instructor Moorthy may becomes a hurdle and shatter his dreams.

title: RRR
story: Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.

title: DEAR COMRADE
story: Rebel without a cause Bobby constantly gets into fights because of his temper. However, he meets his match when he comes across state-level cricketer Lilly.

title: Raja Rani
story: John and Regina get married only to please their parents but are unhappy. However, things change when they find out about each other's pasts.

title: O KADHAL KANMANI
story: Aditya and Tara fall in love and decide on a live-relationship. However, their perception of marriage changes when they meet an old couple in love.

title: NAAN LOCAL
story: Babu and Keerthy are in love and wish to get married. But her dad wants her to tie the knot with her ex-fiance. How will Babu convince her family to accept him?

title: Janaki Jaane
story: Struggling with panic disorder, Janaki is ecstatic when Unni Mukundan proposes to marry her. Things go south when Janaki's fears land her in serious trouble.

title: GHILLI
story: Kabbadi player Velu gets embroiled in a chaotic situation after he helps Dhanalakshmi escape a notorious gang leader's clasp.
